channel.title: Cooperatives on Steven Deobald
channel.description: Recent content in Cooperatives on Steven Deobald

item.title: Welcome, Gratitude
item.description: I recently suffered the most severe injuries of my life — I experienced a retinal tear and detachment which led to multiple surgeries. Those surgeries themselves have permanently damaged my vision and physically deformed my right eye. While I was recovering, I was unable to read, use a computer, or watch video. Oh. And I was in California, on business. The surgeries prevented me from flying so I was unable to go home to India or home-home to Canada.
